title: Refusing to communicate report
body: Why do we now have no refusing to communicate report :(

replies.body: Because "refusing to communicate" isn't an overly bannable thing, it's generally the actions surrounding the person not communicating that will designate whether they are ban worthy.

The "refusing to communicate" ban was made because with a team based game such as league of legends communication is a big key to leading your team to being victorious so if one player on your team isn't communicating with the rest of the team it leads to lack of knowledge for how the rest of the team wants to play out the many team fights a team will go through.

Lets say the mid laner isn't communicating with the team okay so the RED Team mid laner rotates bot lane. okay then the BLUE Team asks their mid laner for back up he doesnt respond in chat or action ( not helping fight back ) now yes mid lane is about a 7 second walk from mid.
But if blue team was communicating well together the mid laner would of called mia and bot would of well should of taken their actions more on the safe side 

So riot had seen this happen alot in report reasons so now we have a "refusing to communicate" report
